tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Musicians (
 musician_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 musician_name VARCHAR(50),
 genre_preference VARCHAR(50),
 influence VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE ArtistGenreMapping (
    mapping_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    artist_id INT,
    genre_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (artist_id) REFERENCES Artists(artist_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (genre_id) REFERENCES Genres(genre_id)
);
CREATE TABLE musicians (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, genre VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL);
CREATE TABLE genres (id INT PRIMARY KEY, genre_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL);
CREATE TABLE influences (id INT PRIMARY KEY, musician_id INT, genre_id INT, FOREIGN KEY (musician_id) REFERENCES musicians(id), FOREIGN KEY (genre_id) REFERENCES genres(id));
CREATE TABLE songs (id INT PRIMARY KEY, title VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, musician_id INT, genre_id INT, FOREIGN KEY (musician_id) REFERENCES musicians(id), FOREIGN KEY (genre_id) REFERENCES genres(id));
CREATE TABLE musicians ( musician_id INT PRIMARY KEY, musician_name VARCHAR(255), genre_preference VARCHAR(255) );
CREATE TABLE genres ( genre_id INT PRIMARY KEY, genre_name VARCHAR(255), description TEXT );
CREATE TABLE albums ( album_id INT PRIMARY KEY, album_name VARCHAR(255), release_date DATE, musician_id INT, FOREIGN KEY (musician_id) REFERENCES musicians(musician_id) );
CREATE TABLE tracks ( track_id INT PRIMARY KEY, track_name VARCHAR(255), duration TIME, album_id INT, FOREIGN KEY (album_id) REFERENCES albums(album_id) );

CREATE TABLE influences ( influence_id INT PRIMARY KEY, musician_id INT, influenced_musician_id INT, FOREIGN KEY (musician_id) REFERENCES musicians(musician_id), FOREIGN KEY (influenced_musician_id) REFERENCES musicians(musician_id) );
